mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Big Events", "The Rising Cost of Square Dancing", "Thoughts from a Square Dance Doctor", "Guide to Better Dancing", "SIOASDS Membership Bulletin Fifteen", and "National Square Dance Convention". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "Hot Line-Late News", "From the Floor", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Square Dance Diary", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "The Callers Textbook", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
